daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: NYPD is boosting security at Staten Island churches following recent incidents, while NYC faces cell service outages and prepares for modified transit services on MLK Day; Mayor Mamdani is also taking legal action against a delivery app amid ongoing discussions about AI regulations and public safety measures.
